page.title: 17Religion
page.content: {Denominations} The area is predominantly C.of E. though there is also a reasonably strong Methodist community and a few Roman Catholics. {Parishes} The small section to the east of the estuary lies within the Parish of Beetham, though for all practical purposes ministration is centred on the adjacent Parish of Arnside. The west of the estuary is deivided between the Parishes of Levens and Lindale. {Churches} The small Mission Church of All Saints at Storth is ministered by the Vicar of Arnside. Similarly a small Methodist Chapel in Storth is served by the Minister from Arnside. The nearest Catholic Churches are at Arnside, Milnthorpe and Grange. West of the estuary residents attend church at Levens, Lindale or Grange.
